title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 26, 2021

items.title: Awesome Substrate
items.content_text:
### Tools

*   [`srtool-cli`](https://github.com/chevdor/srtool-cli) - CLI frontend for the `srtool` Docker image.
items.content_html:
Tools

  • srtool-cli - CLI frontend for the srtool Docker image.

items.title: Awesome Java
items.content_text:
### CLI / Argument Parsing

*   [jbock (⭐89)](https://github.com/jbock-java/jbock) - Reflectionless command line parser.

### Utility / Mocking

*   [Java Diff Utils](https://java-diff-utils.github.io/java-diff-utils/) - Utilities for text or data comparison and patching.
items.content_html:
CLI / Argument Parsing

  • jbock (⭐89) - Reflectionless command line parser.

Utility / Mocking

items.title: Awesome Game Remakes
items.content_text:
### Action

*   [Rigel Engine (⭐952)](https://github.com/lethal-guitar/RigelEngine) - Modern reimplementation of the classic DOS game Duke Nukem II in C++.

### Online

*   [Space Station 14 (⭐3.2k)](https://github.com/space-wizards/space-station-14) - Space Station 14 is a revived attempt at a Space Station 13 remake.
items.content_html:
Action

  • Rigel Engine (⭐952) - Modern reimplementation of the classic DOS game Duke Nukem II in C++.

Online

  • Space Station 14 (⭐3.2k) - Space Station 14 is a revived attempt at a Space Station 13 remake.

items.title: Awesome Clojure
items.content_text:
### Advanced datastructures

*   [Duratom (⭐217)](https://github.com/jimpil/duratom): persisted atoms

### Version Control Management

*   [clj-jgit (⭐256)](https://github.com/clj-jgit/clj-jgit)

### GUI

*   [fx-clj (⭐108)](https://github.com/aaronc/fx-clj)

### Database

*   [Monger](http://clojuremongodb.info/): for MongoDB
*   [Monglorious](https://baumandm.github.io/monglorious/): for MongoDB
*   [clj-rethinkdb (⭐204)](https://github.com/apa512/clj-rethinkdb): for RethinkDB
*   [Revise (⭐145)](https://github.com/bitemyapp/revise): for RethinkDB
*   [Spandex (⭐263)](https://github.com/mpenet/spandex): for ElasticSearch
*   [Elastisch](http://clojureelasticsearch.info/): for ElasticSearch
*   [neocons](http://clojureneo4j.info/): for Neo4j
*   [Alia (⭐247)](https://github.com/mpenet/alia): for Cassandra
*   [aerospike-clj (⭐29)](https://github.com/AppsFlyer/aerospike-clj): for Aerospike

### Security

*   [bolt (⭐120)](https://github.com/juxt/bolt)

### Data Validation

*   [domaintypes (⭐6)](https://github.com/friemen/domaintypes)

### Pattern Matching

*   [Verbal-Exprejon (⭐92)](https://github.com/WeshGuillaume/Verbal-Exprejon)

### Machine Learning

*   [neanderthal (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/uncomplicate/neanderthal): fast matrix library
*   [clojurecuda (⭐186)](https://github.com/uncomplicate/clojurecuda)
*   [clojurecl (⭐280)](https://github.com/uncomplicate/clojurecl)
*   [bayadera (⭐366)](https://github.com/uncomplicate/bayadera): bayesian data analysis on the GPU
*   [Flare (⭐287)](https://github.com/aria42/flare)
*   [MXNet - Clojure API](https://mxnet.apache.org/versions/1.7.0/api/clojure)
*   [clj-ml (⭐147)](https://github.com/antoniogarrote/clj-ml)
*   [Clatern (⭐67)](https://github.com/rinuboney/clatern)
*   [k9 (⭐103)](https://github.com/gigasquid/k9)
*   [Statistiker (⭐64)](https://github.com/clojurewerkz/statistiker)
*   [Synaptic (⭐88)](https://github.com/japonophile/synaptic)
*   [Infer (⭐176)](https://github.com/aria42/infer)

### Computer Vision

*   [origami (⭐128)](https://github.com/hellonico/origami): OpenCV 4 wrapper

### Editor Plugins

*   [Notepad++ (⭐24)](https://github.com/linpengcheng/ClojureBoxNpp): modified config files of Lisp

### Documentation

*   [codox (⭐673)](https://github.com/weavejester/codox)

### Miscellaneous

*   [clj-grpc (⭐17)](https://github.com/otwieracz/clj-grpc)

### Terminal UI

*   [clojure-lanterna (⭐217)](https://github.com/MultiMUD/clojure-lanterna)

### Exercises / YouTube

*   [rich4clojure (⭐222)](https://github.com/PEZ/rich4clojure)
items.content_html:

  • Duratom (⭐217): persisted atoms

  • bayadera (⭐366): bayesian data analysis on the GPU
  • Flare (⭐287)
  • MXNet - Clojure API
  • clj-ml (⭐147)
  • Clatern (⭐67)
  • k9 (⭐103)
  • Statistiker (⭐64)
  • Synaptic (⭐88)
  • Infer (⭐176)

Editor Plugins

items.title: Awesome Fastapi
items.content_text:
### Courses / Other Tools

*   [The Definitive Guide to Celery and FastAPI](https://testdriven.io/courses/fastapi-celery/) - Learn how to add Celery to a FastAPI application to provide asynchronous task processing.
items.content_html:
Courses / Other Tools

  • The Definitive Guide to Celery and FastAPI - Learn how to add Celery to a FastAPI application to provide asynchronous task processing.

items.title: Awesome Gbdev
items.content_text:
### ASM / Syntax highlighting packages

*   [Death Planet](https://makrill.itch.io/death-planet)
*   [Quartet](https://makrill.itch.io/quartet) - Puzzle game for the Game Boy (Color) and Super Game Boy.
*   [Dangan](https://snorpung.itch.io/dangan-gb)

### C / Syntax highlighting packages

*   [Super Princess' 2092 Exodus (⭐28)](https://github.com/Zal0/gbjam2016) - ([ZGB engine (⭐741)](https://github.com/Zal0/ZGB/)).
*   [Tobu Tobu Girl Deluxe (⭐85)](https://github.com/SimonLarsen/tobutobugirl-dx) - An arcade platformer for the Game Boy (Color).
*   [Black Castle](https://gbdev.gg8.se/forums/viewtopic.php?id=743) - Side scrolling platformer for the Game Boy ([itch.io](https://user0x7f.itch.io/black-castle)).
*   [Genesis](https://gbdev.gg8.se/forums/viewtopic.php?id=674) - Shmup for the Game Boy ([itch.io](https://user0x7f.itch.io/genesis)).
*   [Indestructo Tank!](https://antonylavelle.itch.io/indestructotank-gb)
*   [Powa!](https://aiguanachein.itch.io/powa) - Side scrolling platformer for the Game Boy (Color)  ([ZGB engine (⭐741)](https://github.com/Zal0/ZGB/)).
*   [Cavern](https://thegreatgallus.itch.io/cavern-mvm-9) - ([ZGB engine (⭐741)](https://github.com/Zal0/ZGB/)).
*   [Mona and the Witch's Hat Deluxe](https://ctneptune.itch.io/mona-and-the-witchs-hat-dx) - ([ZGB engine (⭐741)](https://github.com/Zal0/ZGB/)).
*   [The Bouncing Ball](https://gamejolt.com/games/the-bouncing-ball-gb/86699)
*   [DMG Deals Damage](https://drludos.itch.io/dmg-deals-damage)

### GB Studio / Syntax highlighting packages

*   [Soul Void](https://kadabura.itch.io/soul-void) - Interactive horror fiction.
*   [Deadeus](https://izma.itch.io/deadeus)
*   [SUPER IMPOSTOR BROS.](https://lumpytouch.itch.io/super-impostor-bros)
items.content_html:

  • Death Planet
  • Quartet - Puzzle game for the Game Boy (Color) and Super Game Boy.
  • Dangan

C / Syntax highlighting packages

  • Super Princess' 2092 Exodus (⭐28) - (ZGB engine (⭐741)).
  • Tobu Tobu Girl Deluxe (⭐85) - An arcade platformer for the Game Boy (Color).
  • Black Castle - Side scrolling platformer for the Game Boy (itch.io).
  • Genesis - Shmup for the Game Boy (itch.io).
  • Indestructo Tank!
  • Powa! - Side scrolling platformer for the Game Boy (Color) (ZGB engine (⭐741)).
  • Cavern - (ZGB engine (⭐741)).
  • Mona and the Witch's Hat Deluxe - (ZGB engine (⭐741)).
  • The Bouncing Ball

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Health

- API: [LAPIS](https://cov-spectrum.ethz.ch/public)

  Description: SARS-CoV-2 genomic sequences from public sources

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes
items.content_html:
Health

  • API: LAPIS

    Description: SARS-CoV-2 genomic sequences from public sources

    Auth: No

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Yes

items.title: Awesome Naming
items.content_text:
### User Interface Design

*   [Clipboard](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clipboard_\(computing\)) - Where you temporarily put *files* you are working with (i.e. the copy & paste buffer).
items.content_html:
User Interface Design

  • Clipboard - Where you temporarily put files you are working with (i.e. the copy & paste buffer).

items.title: Awesome Quant
items.content_text:
### JavaScript / FrameWorks

*   [Ghostfolio (⭐6k)](https://github.com/ghostfolio/ghostfolio) - Wealth management software to keep track of financial assets like stocks, ETFs or cryptocurrencies and make solid, data-driven investment decisions.
items.content_html:
JavaScript / FrameWorks

  • Ghostfolio (⭐6k) - Wealth management software to keep track of financial assets like stocks, ETFs or cryptocurrencies and make solid, data-driven investment decisions.

items.title: Awesome Incident Response
items.content_text:
### IR Tools Collection / Incident Management

*   [DFTimewolf (⭐325)](https://github.com/log2timeline/dftimewolf) - A framework for orchestrating forensic collection, processing and data export.
*   [Shuffle (⭐2k)](https://github.com/frikky/Shuffle) - A general purpose security automation platform focused on accessibility.

### IR Tools Collection / Other Tools

*   [Raccine (⭐965)](https://github.com/Neo23x0/Raccine) - A Simple Ransomware Protection
*   [sysmon-config (⭐5.1k)](https://github.com/SwiftOnSecurity/sysmon-config) - Sysmon configuration file template with default high-quality event tracing
*   [sysmon-modular (⭐2.8k)](https://github.com/olafhartong/sysmon-modular) - A repository of sysmon configuration modules
items.content_html:
IR Tools Collection / Incident Management

  • DFTimewolf (⭐325) - A framework for orchestrating forensic collection, processing and data export.
  • Shuffle (⭐2k) - A general purpose security automation platform focused on accessibility.

IR Tools Collection / Other Tools

  • Raccine (⭐965) - A Simple Ransomware Protection
  • sysmon-config (⭐5.1k) - Sysmon configuration file template with default high-quality event tracing
  • sysmon-modular (⭐2.8k) - A repository of sysmon configuration modules

items.title: Awesome Integration
items.content_text:
### Resources / Articles

*   [Enterprise Integration Using REST](http://martinfowler.com/articles/enterpriseREST.html) - Discusses the constraints and flexibility that you have with nonpublic APIs, and lessons learned from doing large scale RESTful integration across multiple teams.
*   [Richardson Maturity Model](http://martinfowler.com/articles/richardsonMaturityModel.html) - Explained by Martin Fowler, originally presented by Leonard Richardson.

### Resources / Market Analysis

*   BPM
    *   [Gartner Critical Capabilities for Intelligent Business Process Management Suites](https://www.gartner.com/doc/code/292486)
    *   [Gartner Magic Quadrant for Intelligent Business Process Management Suites](https://www.gartner.com/doc/code/345694)
*   ETL
    *   [Gartner Critical Capabilities for Data Integration Tools](https://www.gartner.com/doc/code/464068)
    *   [Gartner Magic Quadrant for Data Integration Tools](https://www.gartner.com/doc/code/450251)
items.content_html:
Resources / Articles

  • Enterprise Integration Using REST - Discusses the constraints and flexibility that you have with nonpublic APIs, and lessons learned from doing large scale RESTful integration across multiple teams.
  • Richardson Maturity Model - Explained by Martin Fowler, originally presented by Leonard Richardson.

Resources / Market Analysis

  • BPM
    • Gartner Critical Capabilities for Intelligent Business Process Management Suites
    • Gartner Magic Quadrant for Intelligent Business Process Management Suites
  • ETL
    • Gartner Critical Capabilities for Data Integration Tools
    • Gartner Magic Quadrant for Data Integration Tools

items.title: Urban and Regional Planning Resources
items.content_text:
### Public Data Resources / Climate

*   [NCDC Storm Data](https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/access/metadata/landing-page/bin/iso?id=gov.noaa.ncdc:C00510) - United States storm data provided by the National Weather Service (NWS) and contain statistics on personal injuries and damage estimates.

### Public Data Resources / Resilience and Natural Hazards

*   [Earth Quake Data](https://www.ngdc.noaa.gov/hazard/earthqk.shtml) - NOAA provided data includes a global record of significant earth quakes going back to 2150 BC to present with geographic information.
items.content_html:
Public Data Resources / Climate

  • NCDC Storm Data - United States storm data provided by the National Weather Service (NWS) and contain statistics on personal injuries and damage estimates.

Public Data Resources / Resilience and Natural Hazards

  • Earth Quake Data - NOAA provided data includes a global record of significant earth quakes going back to 2150 BC to present with geographic information.
